E Stream Software Sdn. Bhd.
E Stream Software Sdn. Bhd. (commonly known as E Stream or E Stream MSC or SQL Account HQ) is a Malaysian technology company that develops and provides business management software solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). E Stream offers on-premise, cloud-based, and hybrid cloud systems that support accounting, payroll, and other business management operations. E Streamâ€™s solutions are offered under a software-as-a-service (SaaS) model and are available either through lifetime licenses or subscription plans, depending on the package type and the number of companies or entities managed. E Stream is headquartered in Setia Alam, Selangor, with an additional office located in Setapak, Kuala Lumpur.
Awards
The company has received several industry recognitions, including:
* The Golden Bull Award (2025)
* The Star Outstanding Business Awards (SOBA) (2021) for Best Customer Service
* The Sin Chew Business Excellence Awards (2019) for Best Accounting Software
